i1.name: Eternal_Hunger
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Warwick''' deals {{as|{{pp|12 to 46}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}.

While below {{as|{{sti|health|50% '''maximum''' health}}}}, '''Warwick''' also {{tip|heal|heals}} for 100% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} dealt by ''Eternal Hunger'', increased to 250% while below {{as|25% '''maximum''' health}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Warwick deals 12undefined âˆ’ 46undefined (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit.
While below 50% maximum health, Warwick also heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by Eternal Hunger, increased to 250% while below 25% maximum health.
i1.notes:
* ''Eternal Hunger'' does not affect:
** structures ([[turret]]s, [[inhibitor]]s, and the [[nexus]]),
** [[ward]]s (except {{tip|Effigy|effigies}}),
** {{cai|Powder Keg|Gangplank|kegs}}
{{Pending for test}} Other units with modified health behaviour.

q1.name: Jaws_of_the_Beast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' bites the target enemy after a {{rutngt|0.2475}} delay, dealing them {{as|120% AD}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to a {{as|percentage of the target's '''maximum''' health}}, with the latter being capped against {{tip|monsters}}. '''Warwick''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for a portion of the '''total''' {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and most modifiers.}} dealt by the ability.

While ''Jaws of the Beast'' is in effect, '''Warwick''' is {{tip|displacement immune|immune to displacements}} and sticks to his target, following their position anywhere on the map. Additionally, the ability can be held for additional effects.

{{sbc|Hold:}} '''Warwick''' performs the bite and the lunge as usual, then begins to {{tip|channel|charge}} for {{fd|0.5 seconds}}, during which he {{tip|dash|leaps}} behind his target. The duration is extended if the target is under the effect of a {{tip|dash}} or a {{tip|airborne|displacement}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick bites the target enemy after a 0.264 delay, dealing them 120% AD (+ 100% AP) magic damage and bonus magic damage equal to a percentage of the target's maximum health, with the latter being capped against monsters. Warwick heals for a portion of the total post-mitigation damage dealt by the ability.
While Jaws of the Beast is in effect, Warwick is immune to displacements and sticks to his target, following their position anywhere on the map. Additionally, the ability can be held for additional effects.
Tap: Warwick lunges at his target.
Hold: Warwick performs the bite and the lunge as usual, then begins to charge for 0.5 seconds, during which he leaps behind his target. The duration is extended if the target is under the effect of a dash or a displacement.
q1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects, {{tip|on-attack}} effects, and {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
* If the target dies prior to '''Warwick''' reaching them, ''Jaws of the Beast'' refunds its cooldown when tapped. The ability can be still held, however, '''Warwick''' is no longer eligible for the refund in this case.
** The refund can occasionally fail. {{bug}}
* As mentioned, ''Jaws of the Beast's'' heal is calculated only from its own damage dealt. Additional damage effects, such as {{tip|on-hit|on-hits}}, are not.
* If the cast started beforehand, both the damage and the heal occur even after '''Warwick's''' {{tip|death}}, or during {{tip|resurrection}}.
* It has been special cased so '''Warwick''' does not follow an enemy's {{si|Recall}} or a {{ci|Sion}} that revives from {{ai|I|Sion}}, unless they're first bitten (they're not followed if they recall before '''Warwick''' reaches them).
* ''Jaws of the Beast's'' channel cannot be initiated while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. '''Warwick''' can only use the normal cast.
** The channel will '''not''' be interrupted by either of the two effects, despite the lock-on being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
* The bite always occurs after the same delay, however the time spent lunging does not, which depends based on the range ''Jaw of the Beast'' was cast away from the target, up to a lunge duration of {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
** The lunge duration does not affect the {{tip|lockout}} timer on, which is the same as the bite's delay.
** '''Warwick's''' lunge always places him to his attack range to the center of his target.
* '''Warwick's''' dash will place him up to the edge of his attack range from the target.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* In order to hit the cap, the target monster needs to have at least {{as|{{ap|(100 to 200)/((6 to 10)/100)|round=ceil}} health}}.
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' is the only ability in the game that combines {{tip|channel|channeling}} with {{tip|displacement immune|displacement immunity}}. Every {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} crowd control effect that is not resisted by the displacement immunity will prematurely stop the {{tip|dash}}.
** The bite can still occur if cast before the crowd control application, but '''Warwick''' cannot start channeling.
** Abilities that apply both {{tip|stun}} and {{tip|airborne}} at the same time cause '''Warwick''' to ignore the displacement, but prematurely stop the channel and the dash.
** The only exception to this is {{cai|I|Sion}}.
* '''Warwick''' will follow enemies that move via {{tip|attach|attachment}} effects but the lock-on will '''not''' be extended.
* While ''Jaws of the Beast'' does not use Quick Casting by default, click-and-hold is comparable to the input required to use {{ai|Bone Skewer|Pyke}} or {{ai|Comet Spear|Pantheon}}. It does not accept two-click input (e.g. First Cast and Recast) that abilities like {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} or {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}} use in Standard Casting.
* '''Warwick''' will attempt to basic attack the target after a short delay.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Warwick''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack = false|cast = {{ai|Primal Howl|Warwick}} is usable. {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}} and {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} are disabled.|move=false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts|items=interrupts,true,interrupts,false,interrupts,melee|consume=true}}
'''Known Issues'''
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' will also refund its {{sti|cooldown}} if it kills the target after being held for exactly its bite delay. {{bug|1|Started in patch 10.1}}
* The ability can be shortly cast on a dead target, with the ability going on cooldown.{{bug|1|Started in patch 10.1}}

w1.name: Blood_Hunt
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Warwick''' senses all enemies on the map who are damaged below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, marking them with ''Blood Hunt'' and gaining bonuses against them. The bonuses are increased to 250% against enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
Upon [[basic attack]]ing a marked target, '''Warwick''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} against them but will lose it when switching to a target that is not ''Blood Hunted''.

If the target is a {{tip|champion}}, '''Warwick''' will see trails leading toward the ''Blood Hunted'' target, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while following the path, however, this bonus is lost for {{fd|0.5}} seconds upon [[Combat status|entering combat]] with an enemy champion but will build up again over the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' senses all nearby enemies within a large radius and marks the nearest enemy champion with ''Blood Hunt'' for 8 seconds, regardless of their {{as|{{sti|health|'''current''' health}}}}.

This ability cannot be cast for 3 seconds after entering combat with an enemy champion. Additionally, while no enemies are currently being ''Blood Hunted'', the '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Blood Hunt'' is reduced by 1 each second.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Warwick senses all enemies on the map who are damaged below 50% of their maximum health, marking them with Blood Hunt and gaining bonuses against them. The bonuses are increased to 250% against enemies below 20% of their maximum health.
Upon basic attacking a marked target, Warwick gains bonus attack speed against them but will lose it when switching to a target that is not Blood Hunted.
If the target is a champion, Warwick will see trails leading toward the Blood Hunted target, gaining bonus movement speed while following the path, however, this bonus is lost for 0.5 seconds upon Combat status with an enemy champion but will build up again over the next 3.5 seconds.
Active: Warwick senses all nearby enemies within a large radius and marks the nearest enemy champion with Blood Hunt for 8 seconds, regardless of their current health.
This ability cannot be cast for 3 seconds after entering combat with an enemy champion. Additionally, while no enemies are currently being Blood Hunted, the current cooldown of Blood Hunt is reduced by 1 each second.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|70 to 110}}%|Increased Attack Speed|{{ap|70*2.5 to 110*2.5}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|35*2.5 to 55*2.5}}%}}
w1.notes:
* {{correction}} The in-game description incorrectly states that the bonuses are tripled (300%) against enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
** {{ais|Eternal Hunger|Warwick}} had a similar issue which was eventually fixed when it was rewritten, but ''Blood Hunt'' did not.
* ''Blood Hunt'' can detect and target [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoys]].
* '''Warwick''' will lose his movement speed bonus if enemies that are not ''Blood Hunted'' stay exactly between him and the ''Blood Hunted'' target.
** The same applies to enemy champions that went under the threshold by taking [[Nexus Obelisk]] damage or to units that spawn with their current health below the threshold (i.e {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}).
* ''Blood Hunt'' will occur from wherever '''Warwick''' was at the start of the cast time.

e1.name: Primal_Howl
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' gains {{tip|damage reduction}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds. ''Primal Howl'' can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Warwick''' howls, ending ''Primal Howl's'' effects and causing all nearby enemies to {{tip|flee}} from him for 1 second and become {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for the same duration.
Starting {{ais|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} channel while ''Primal Howl'' is active will initiate the recast without ending the damage reduction buff prematurely.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick gains damage reduction for up to 2.5 seconds. Primal Howl can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration.
Recast: Warwick howls, ending Primal Howl's effects and causing all nearby enemies to flee from him for 1 second and become slowed by 90% for the same duration.
Starting Warwick's Infinite Duress channel while Primal Howl is active will initiate the recast without ending the damage reduction buff prematurely.
e1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation.
* The recast's howling animation has a {{fd|0.5}}-second {{tip|lockout}} time.
** This will also cancel '''Warwick's''' basic attack.
** '''Warwick''' cannot attack or cast abilities during the animation, instead the last input will be buffered to play after it ends.
* '''Warwick''' will automatically recast if he enters {{tip|resurrection}}.

r1.name: Infinite_Duress
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} in the target direction, during which he is {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}.

If '''Warwick''' collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he stops and {{tip|knockdown|knocks them down}} and {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} them, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them, and dealing them {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, {{tip|sight|revealing}} himself in the process.
'''Warwick''' is {{tip|heal|healed}} for 100% of all {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} he deals to the target during ''Infinite Duress''.
''Infinite Duress'' applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects 3 times, and {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick leaps in the target direction, during which he is immune to crowd control.
If Warwick collides with an enemy champion, he stops and knocks them down and channels for up to 1.5 seconds, suppressing them, revealing them, and dealing them magic damage every 0.25 seconds, revealing himself in the process.
Warwick is healed for 100% of all post-mitigation damage he deals to the target during Infinite Duress.
Infinite Duress applies on-hit and on-attack effects 3 times, and Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
r1.notes:
* ''Infinite Duress'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* The minimum range of the ability is 275 units, based on the minimum movement speed that a champion can have (110) while still being able to move. The "base" range of this ability is {{fd|837.5}} because of his 335 base movement speed.
** Considering movement speed soft caps, with {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, this range increases to {{ap|(335*1.35*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.4*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.45*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.5*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*1.55*0.5+230)*2.5}}, further increased to {{ap|(335*(1+0.35*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.4*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.45*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.5*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.55*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5}} against enemy champions {{as|below 20% health}}.
* The ability deals a total of 9 damage instances that are done in cycles of 3 hits every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, each divided in two instances. The first instance deals 2 hits and triggers the {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects once, while the second instance deals the remaining last hit.
* If '''Warwick''' does not collide with a champion, he will slide a {{tt|fixed distance|estimated 150 units}} past the maximum range during which he is no longer crowd control immune and unable to declare basic attacks or cast movement abilities, including {{si|Flash}}, but being able to cast {{ai|Jaws of the Beast|Warwick}} and {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, with the former also interrupting the slide.
** '''Warwick''' is able to cast {{ai|Primal Howl|Warwick}} at any time during the dash.
* Activating {{ii|Stopwatch}} / {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} during the dash interrupts it.
* Each hit counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}} and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.
* '''Warwick''' gains the {{tip|cc-immune|cc-immunity}} at the start of the cast time.
* {{tip|Cleanse|Cleansing}} the {{tip|suppression}} does not interrupt the {{tip|channel}} and '''Warwick''' will continue to strike but not deal any damage.
** ''Infinite Duress'' is special cased to have its channel interrupted by {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}.
* If the target is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or protected by {{tip|spell shield}} upon collision, '''Warwick''' will not start the {{tip|channel}}.
* If the target is in a {{tip|zombie state}}, '''Warwick''' will stop the channel after ~{{fd|0.5}} seconds of hitting them.{{bug}}
* ''Infinite Duress'' covers '''Warwick's''' hitbox, meaning he will collide with enemy champions that are particularly close to him.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Warwick''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|move=false|cast=false|attack=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

effects.str: • Total Magic Damage: (+ 167% bonus AD)
